clinical_study.title: A Study of AV-101 (Dry Powder Inhaled Imatinib) in Patients With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (PAH)
endpoints: Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in Pulmonary Vascular Resistance (PVR)
Phase 3: Change from Baseline in Six Minute Walk Distance (6MWD)
Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in N-terminal pro B-type natriuretic peptide (NT-proBNP)
Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in Six Minute Walk Distance (6MWD)
Phase 2b: Proportion of Subjects with Improvement in WHO Functional Class
Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in Registry to Evaluate Early and Long-Term PAH Disease Management (REVEAL) Lite 2.0 Risk Score
Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in Health-Related Quality of Life emPHasis-10 Questionnaire Score
Phase 3: Change from Baseline in NT-proBNP
Phase 3: Proportion of Subjects with Improvement in WHO Functional Class
Phase 3: Change from Baseline in Registry to Evaluate Early and Long-Term PAH Disease Management (REVEAL) Lite 2.0 Risk Score
Phase 3: Change from Baseline in Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension-Symptoms and Impact (PAH-SYMPACT) Questionnaire Score

endpoints.name: Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in Pulmonary Vascular Resistance (PVR)
Phase 3: Change from Baseline in Six Minute Walk Distance (6MWD)
Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in N-terminal pro B-type natriuretic peptide (NT-proBNP)
Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in Six Minute Walk Distance (6MWD)
Phase 2b: Proportion of Subjects with Improvement in WHO Functional Class
Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in Registry to Evaluate Early and Long-Term PAH Disease Management (REVEAL) Lite 2.0 Risk Score
endpoints.description: REVEAL Lite 2.0 risk scores range from 1 to 14; a higher score represents higher risk

endpoints.name: Phase 2b: Change from Baseline in Health-Related Quality of Life emPHasis-10 Questionnaire Score
endpoints.description: emPHasis-10 questionnaire scores range from 0 - 50; a higher score represents a higher symptom burden

endpoints.name: Phase 3: Change from Baseline in NT-proBNP
Phase 3: Proportion of Subjects with Improvement in WHO Functional Class
Phase 3: Change from Baseline in Registry to Evaluate Early and Long-Term PAH Disease Management (REVEAL) Lite 2.0 Risk Score
endpoints.description: REVEAL Lite 2.0 risk scores range from 1 to 14; a higher score represents higher risk

endpoints.name: Phase 3: Change from Baseline in Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension-Symptoms and Impact (PAH-SYMPACT) Questionnaire Score
endpoints.description: PAH-SYMPACT is a patient reported outcome instrument developed to assess PAH symptoms and impacts
